Articles.Content: I did this...although I must confess I couldn't wait for it to be over...turns out that Duna is MUCH larger (when you're going from 2 to 10 meters per second, and negotiating the terrain) than one might imagine. MechJeb's rover autopilot was ok as long as the terrain allowed, but I flipped MANY times. My goal was to get Jeb and Bill Kerman around, and back on their lander, before the .90 reality comes to an end. And I'm happy to say I did it. Quite an adventure! Cheers to 1.0!!!

good stuff. yeah i don't know if will ever have the patience to try this myself, much as i would like to.

excited about 1.0 though! hopefully will be out by the time i get home from work tomorrow morning NZ time.
